name: Cox's Bazar
details: Cox's Bazar is a city, fishing port, tourism centre and district headquarters in southeastern Bangladesh.

name: Sundarban
details: The Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal.
